message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think $18,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $15,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
